main event: A witness observed a saucer-shaped unidentified flying object hovering and then accelerating away on September 22, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as having a 200-300 feet diameter, with 20 evenly spaced windows., The object appeared dull silver and emitted a soft blue-white glow., It was estimated to be moving at 10 to 15 times the speed of a jet aircraft when it accelerated., The sighting lasted for approximately 15 to 20 minutes before the object disappeared into the clouds., The witness was able to observe it more clearly with binoculars despite being in a dark setting.
witness description: Male, 43 years old, with several similar sightings and some formal training in aerial phenomena.
